channel.title: Comments on: Extension update!
channel.description: For all that is chat related.

item.title: By: Rodrigo Marcos
item.dc:creator: Rodrigo Marcos
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://turbolego.github.io/turbolego.com//extension-update/#comment-63">turbolego</a>.
Hey! I had this problem and I solved it. I'm using a chrome extension for facebook called: FB Photo Zoom. I tried using the meme chat, but when I clicked, only a white space would appear. Resolution: 1- I disabled the FB Photo Zoom. 2- Closed the chat window I had open. 3- Reopened the closed chat window. 4- Meme all the way you want it! ;)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to turbolego.

Hey! I had this problem and I solved it.
I’m using a chrome extension for facebook called: FB Photo Zoom.
I tried using the meme chat, but when I clicked, only a white space would appear.
Resolution:
1- I disabled the FB Photo Zoom.
2- Closed the chat window I had open.
3- Reopened the closed chat window.
4- Meme all the way you want it! ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: turbolego
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://turbolego.github.io/turbolego.com//extension-update/#comment-132">Shahar Caufman</a>.
The white spaces between the pieces? Sounds like you still have the old extension activated, that did not have the white spaces removed.
Follow this guide to diable the old extension in firefox: http://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/Uninstalling%20add-ons
Follow this guide to diable the old extension in google chrome: http://support.google.com/chrome/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=113907
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Shahar Caufman.

The white spaces between the pieces?
Sounds like you still have the old extension activated, that did not have the white spaces removed.

Follow this guide to diable the old extension in firefox:
http://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/Uninstalling%20add-ons

Follow this guide to diable the old extension in google chrome:
http://support.google.com/chrome/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=113907

item.title: By: turbolego
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://turbolego.github.io/turbolego.com//extension-update/#comment-61">daiquiri</a>.
try restarting the browser, or close all chat windows and do a "F5-button-refresh".
item.content:encoded:
In reply to daiquiri.

try restarting the browser, or close all chat windows and do a “F5-button-refresh”.
